description: This game is cross platform across different OSes (Linux, Mac, Windows) and has been helpful in allowing my 6-7 year old hardware have some sort of life to it. Games Great, Extremely underrated and fun.
apart from quake live probably the most active arena fps. great smooth multiplayer with little to no lag. just join and shoot.

This game is an amazing feat of programming produced by a small team. Even after almost 20 years since the beginning of the development of the cube game series, this game has an active playerbase and competitive community. It can be a bit buggy but still is a solid gameplay experience on more than 200 multiplayer maps for free and it runs on anything that can run quake 3. If you are a fan of arena shooters or were involved in competitive quake in the past, this one is a must try.
Great App, would recommend. I have been enjoying it
I have never tried a game in linux but this rememeber me playing in the scholl. The graphics are good
Absolutely underrated and pure multiplayer shooting fun. This game is perfect in so many ways. It gets many things just right. Great humor too.
It's a great game and even better now then I'm an adult now and still love playing this game.

The executibles have incorrect locations of game files. For example, there's an executible at /var/lib/flatpak/app/org.sauerbraten.Sauerbraten/x86_64/stable/(long hash)/files/bin/sauerbraten.

But that's a bash script that first changes directory to /app/share/sauerbraten. But /app doesn't exist on opensuse 15.1. 

There's another executible, a binary, at /var/lib/flatpak/app/org.sauerbraten.Sauerbraten/x86_64/stable/(long hash)/files/share/sauerbraten/sauerbraten.

But when running that, it's incorrectly locating the library files:

./sauerbraten: error while loading shared libraries: libSDL_image-1.2.so.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

These shared object files do in fact exist at:

/var/lib/flatpak/app/org.sauerbraten.Sauerbraten/x86_64/stable/(long hash)/files/lib/

If someone fixes these location issues, it should run.
Sehr GEIL! Makes much fun YEEEEEEEEET
buen juego lo malo que se bugea al terminar el primer mapa, (apareces en un cuadro plano de suelo y si quieres puedes caer al vació) no se si solo a mi me pasa

este juego es dibertido porque puedes crear y colorear y disparar entonces si no te parece dibertido puedes ir al online y buscar tu servidor que mas te guste entonces es dibertido por esas cosas a mi me gusto porque me alludo ha hacer nuevos amigos y muy guenos yo ice uno llamado Xwalkerpvpro es español y quiero jugar a este juego porque quiero jugar con mi amigo Xwalkerpvpro
no puedo instalarlo porfavor agan que lo instale
summary: esta buna la de tux car

description:
This game might be 16-years old, it's still very pleasant to play today. A jewel of open-source games domain.
It undeniably deserves a revival, as much as a real solo campaign.
